alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; Eastern Santa Clara Hills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 5:29PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alameda and north central Santa Clara Counties through 600 PM PDT... At 529 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Mt. Hamilton, or 14 miles east of Milpitas, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Alameda and north central Santa Clara Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; Eastern Santa Clara Hills
